enWisdom: Lying is the enemy of truthfulness
Muteness is better than lying
Lying is alien to [and incompatible with] faith
Lying tarnishes one’s character
Lying is the disgrace of the tongue

Wisdom: الْكَذِبُ وَالْخِيَانَةُ لَيْسَا مِنْ أَخْلَاقِ الْكِرَامِ
enWisdom: Lying and treachery are not from the qualities of the honourable

Wisdom: الْكَذِبُ زَوَالُ الْمَنْطِقِ عَنِ الْوَضْعِ الْإِلَهِيِّ
enWisdom: Lying is the deviation of speech from the divine order [of creation]
The most repulsive quality is dishonesty
The ugliest thing is falsehood
The most prevalent thing [among the people] is lying and treachery
The bane of transmission is distortion of the narration
The bane of speech is lying
It is through lying that the hypocrites adorn themselves
How evil a speech lying is!
The worst qualities are dishonesty and hypocrisy
The worst of narrations is one that has the most falsehood
The worst of habits is lying

Wisdom: عِلَّةُ الْكَذِبِ شَرُّ عِلَّةٍ وَزَلَّةُ الْمُتَوَقِّي أَشَدُّ زَلَّةٍ
enWisdom: The sickness of dishonesty is the worst sickness and the lapse of the cautious one is the gravest lapse

Wisdom: كَيْفَ يَسْلَمُ مِنْ عَذَابِ اللَّهِ الْمُتَسَرِّعُ إِلَى الْيَمِينِ الْفَاجِرَةِ
enWisdom: How can one be safe from the punishment of Allah when he is quick in making false oaths

Wisdom: لَوْ تَمَيَّزَتِ الْأَشْيَاءُ لَكَانَ الصِّدْقُ مَعَ الشَّجَاعَةِ وَكَانَ الْجُبْنُ مَعَ الْكَذِبِ
enWisdom: If things were to be differentiated from each other, honesty would be with courage and cowardice would be with dishonesty
Telling lies is not from the moral teachings of Islam

Wisdom: مَا كَذَبَ عَاقِلٌ وَلَا زَنَى [خَانَ‏] مُؤْمِنٌ
enWisdom: An intelligent person does not lie and a believer does not fornicate
How repulsive is dishonesty by the people of virtue!

Wisdom: نَكَدُ الْعِلْمِ الْكَذِبُ وَنَكَدُ الْجَدِّ اللَّعِبُ
enWisdom: The spoiler of knowledge is dishonesty and the spoiler of seriousness is idle play
There is no trait more repulsive than lying

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي الْكَذَّابِينَ وَلَا فِي الْعُلَمَاءِ الْأَفَّاكِينَ
enWisdom: There is neither any good in those who are habitual liars nor is there any good in dishonest scholars
